title: Deceptively Framed Lotteries in Consumer MarketsWe are grateful to Simon Cordes, Vincent Eulenberg, Alexander Koch, Hannah Schildberg-Hörisch, Leon Landes, Anna Ressi, and Florian Zimmermann for helpful comments. We also wish to thank conference and seminar audiences at the MPI for Research on Collective Goods, the DICE Winter School, and the Workshop of the Research Group on Consumer Preferences, Consumer Mistakes, and Firms’ Response. We gratefully acknowledge financial support by the German Research Foundation (DFG project No. 462020252).
